TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SocketOptionLevel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines socket option levels for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The SocketOptionLevel enumeration defines the socket option levels that can be passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods. <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> enumerated values are grouped by SocketOptionLevel.
**Note** To use IPv6 on Windows XP, install Advance Networking Pack for Windows XP.
## Examples The following example uses this enumeration to set socket options.
[!code-cs[Socket_Socket_Options#1](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.net.sockets.soc_1_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Socket_Socket_Options#1](../../add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.net.sockets.soc_1_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Socket_Socket_Options#1](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.net.sockets.soc_1_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel IP = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel IPv6 = int32(41)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel Socket = int32(65535)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel Tcp = int32(6)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel Udp = int32(17)
